title: Regulations made under the Section 61 of the Fisheries and Aquatic Resources Act, No.2 of 1996
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Rajitha Senaratne, Minister of Fisheries and Aquatic Resources Development to submit the Gazette Extraordinary Notification numbers 1780/31 dated 2012?10?19 and 1788/41 dated 2012?12?14, containing regulations made under Section 61 of the Fisheries and Aquatic Resources Act, No.2 of 1996 to Parliament, was approved by the Cabinet.
